resources.string: You already have the last prediction
Right now, MeteoGalicia recomputes predictions just twice a day.
%s in the morning, with %s wind and rain probability of %.0f%%.\n %s in the afternoon, with %s wind and rain probability of %.0f%%.\n %s in the night, with %s wind and rain probability of %.0f%%.
%s, with %s wind and rain probability of %.0f%%.

string-array.name: changelog_3_0
string-array.item: Added all the municipalities from Galicia.
Medium term predictions have now description when tapping on them.
Fixed a bug when tapping over short-term predictions if Meteogalicia does not have wind info.
Removed the option of updating all the stations, to contain data transfers now that we support 315 municipalities.

string-array.name: changelog_2_8
string-array.item: Migrated short-term predictions to the new Meteogalicia data format.
Medium-term predictions disabled temporarily until they are adapted to the new data format.

string-array.name: changelog_2_7
string-array.item: Added Ortigueira station. Thanks to Manel Villar for the patch.

string-array.name: changelog_2_6
string-array.item: Synced with the new Meteogalicia RSS format

string-array.name: changelog_2_4
string-array.item: Fixed a bug with dialog management

string-array.name: changelog_2_3
string-array.item: Fixed a bug in Android 1.5 devices
Fixed a bug with the new description dialog

string-array.name: changelog_2_2
string-array.item: Short term predictions are now clickable to see the description
Fixed a bug when using a huge background image

string-array.name: changelog_2_1
string-array.item: Fixed a couple of bugs reported by users

string-array.name: changelog_2_0
string-array.item: You can change the background image. Tip: Use vertical images to avoid stretching.
The [Why?] button next to the prediction time will not be shown after you press it once.
Fixed a bug in the widget, that was showing the previous day prediction sometimes.
Added a share button to the menu. Use it to tell your friends about OTempo.

string-array.name: changelog_1_9
string-array.item: You can set the automatic synchronization period.
You can set the number of stations that are regularly updated.
Increased performance when processing RSS from MeteoGalicia (saves battery).
Preferences now show the default values when unset.
Solved bug that could crash OTempo when updating without Internet access. Reported by a user.
Predicted time now correctly displays minutes.

string-array.name: changelog_1_8
string-array.item: Upgraded advertisement library to reduce network traffic and battery consumption.

string-array.name: changelog_1_7
string-array.item: Added prediction time to the interface.
Added galician translation (for devices supporting this language).

string-array.name: changelog_1_6
string-array.item: Fixed a bug with "today" detection, now the current day shows again in the application.
Added a workaround for corrupted Meteogalicia RSS.

string-array.name: changelog_1_5
string-array.item: Created a widget. You can add it by long-pressing in the home screen.
Created a service that updates predictions in the background, if you have this enabled in the global android configuration.
While OTempo is updating predictions, it shows a notification.

string-array.name: changelog_1_4
string-array.item: Fixed a bug parsing Meteogalicia RSS.

string-array.name: changelog_1_3
string-array.item: Does not show past days when Internet is off.
Does not desynchronize the station switcher and the content when Internet is off.
The advertisement was moved to the bottom, to make it less annoying.
Does not crash when using Source Menu without a selected location.
Does not crash when using My location Menu without GPS.
